description: colossal head of Bodhisattva, sandstone, repeated stylized pattern in hair which forms a crown shape with a cone rising from the center; broken from a figure at the neck
dimension: 35 x 18 1/2 x 20 in. (88.9 x 46.99 x 50.8 cm) (does not include base)
title: Head of Door Guardian (Dvarapala)
